display_long_description:
Unleash your creativity in Fancy Block Builder, a voxel-based sandbox where every side of every block can shine! Build, tint, and design your dream worlds, explore amazing player creations, and enter your masterpieces to win Build of the Month!

Only your imagination sets the limit. Combine the freedom of sandbox block building with the full-body immersion only VR can deliver!

**No rules - just blocks and dreams.**

Mix paints...
[media]

Build...
[media]

And submit your creations!
[media]


**FEATURES**

🧰 Intuitive building tools for all skill levels

🎨 A colourful experience - the entire RGB scale is there

🧱 Step inside, and live your own voxel based creations

🙉 No audio required

🏆Compete for the prestigious placement of Build of the Month

🧠 Join in shaping the game, share your mind in the official discord https://discord.gg/UxJvVjQcg4
